Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

Bandai Namco Entertainment launches pre-registration for Dragon Ball Gekishin Squadra globally. The highly anticipated 4v4 team battle game arrives across Android, iOS, PlayStation 5 and 4, and Steam platforms simultaneously. Android gamers can secure their spot through Google Play immediately, with milestone rewards and exclusive content awaiting early participants before the explosive 2025 release date.

Global Pre-Registration Campaign Goes Live

Pre-registration opened July 22, 2025. Dragon Ball fans worldwide can now secure early access rewards and participate in a massive milestone challenge that spans multiple gaming platforms including Android's Google Play store.

This cross-platform debut represents one of the most ambitious launches in Dragon Ball gaming history. Early participants automatically receive launch notifications and exclusive in-game bonuses. The global campaign creates unprecedented excitement among longtime franchise enthusiasts and newcomers alike.

Revolutionary 4v4 MOBA Combat System

Dragon Ball Gekishin Squadra transforms iconic characters into strategic team fighters. Players choose heroes with distinct combat roles including tanks, damage dealers, and technical specialists.

The free-to-play Multiplayer Online Battle Arena format emphasizes tactical cooperation over individual power. Mastering hero abilities becomes essential for arena domination. Esports-ready competitive modes ensure lasting engagement across all supported platforms with balanced, skill-based matchmaking systems.

Exclusive Son Goku Mini Reward Unlocks at 3 Million

Son Goku (Mini) from Dragon Ball DAIMA awaits dedicated fans. This exclusive hero becomes available when global pre-registrations reach 3 million participants before launch.

The miniature warrior specializes in nimble mid-range combat techniques. His unique abilities bring fresh tactical options to team compositions while celebrating the newest anime series. Every pre-registration pushes the community closer to unlocking this coveted character for all players worldwide.

Simple Registration Process Across All Platforms

Android users access pre-registration through Google Play or the official Dragon Ball Gekishin Squadra portal instantly. Each signup guarantees launch rewards while contributing to the global milestone count.

Pre-registration extends to iOS, PlayStation, and Steam platforms currently. Nintendo Switch support follows soon, making this the most accessible Dragon Ball game launch ever attempted. The streamlined process ensures maximum participation in milestone rewards and community building.

Why Android Gamers Should Join This Epic Adventure

Trusted Dragon Ball characters meet cutting-edge multiplayer innovation perfectly. The combination delivers unprecedented mobile gaming excitement for Android users seeking competitive team-based action.

Milestone rewards, inclusive pre-registration benefits, and serious esports potential establish this as 2025's must-play mobile title. Innovative combat mechanics promise lasting engagement well beyond launch day. Arena victories await those ready to master strategic team coordination and unlock legendary heroes through dedicated gameplay.

Cross-platform pre-registration creates unprecedented opportunities for Dragon Ball fans everywhere. Milestone rewards, innovative team gameplay, and global community participation combine to deliver gaming excitement on an massive scale. This MOBA installment honors Dragon Ball's legendary action while introducing strategic depth that will captivate players long after launch day arrives.

With over a decade's experience covering the world of Android and having reviewed more devices than he can count, Peter is excited about where the world of tech is heading. He is currently packing the Oppo Find X8 Pro, OnePlus Pad 2, and an ASUS Chromebook Plus.
